fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Become your backup role once the player with that role dies.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are a backup of the [x].
- If your faction has a night chat, you will not have access to it until you become your true role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Become the role you are a Backup of and fulfill its win condition OR win with the faction that you are a backup of.
